Trade/Device Name(s): Psychemedics Homogeneous Enzyme Immunoassay for Cocaine in Hair
Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and Cocaine Metabolite Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Psychemedics Homogeneous Enzyme Immunoassay for preliminary qualitative detection of cocaine in human hair specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Preliminary qualitative detection of cocaine in human head and body hair for identifying cocaine use, intended exclusively for in-house professional use; positive results require confirmation with a more specific alternate chemical method (e.g., LC/MS/MS).
